card_text: 3+ monsters with different Attributes$NYou can only control 1 "The Arrival Cyberse @Ignister". The original ATK of this card becomes 1000 x the number of Link Materials used for its Link Summon. Unaffected by other cards' effects. Once per turn: You can target 1 other monster on the field; destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "@Ignister Token" (Cyberse/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) to your zone this card points to.
